devices:
Generic/Java hasPointerEvents, hasCommandKeyEvents, isVirtual A device to build supports applets, desktop and webstart applications.
Generic/midp1 isVirtual A device that merely supports the MIDP 1.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
Generic/PlainMidp1 isVirtual A device that merely supports the MIDP 1.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards and does not support the J2ME Polish GUI.
Generic/midp2 isVirtual A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
Generic/Midp2Cldc11 isVirtual A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards.
Generic/Midp2Cldc11Pointer isVirtual, hasPointerEvents A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards and has a pointer based user interface.
Generic/multi This device combines several features of different vendors. It can be used in case you want to use dynamic class loading etc for determing the device capabilities during runtime. isVirtual
Generic/wtk A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards and has a pointer based user interface. isVirtual
Generic/pda This device provides access to JSR75/PDA API.. isVirtual
Generic/PlainMidp2 isVirtual A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards and does not support the J2ME Polish GUI.
Generic/PlainMidp2Cldc11 A device that merely supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards and does not support the J2ME Polish GUI. isVirtual
Generic/jsr185 isVirtual An JTWI 1.0 compatible device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
Generic/jtwi isVirtual An JTWI 1.0 compatible device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards.
Generic/JtwiCldc11 isVirtual An JTWI 1.0 compatible device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 standards.
Generic/wmapi20 isVirtual An device that supports the MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.0 standards along with the Wireless Messaging API 2.0.
Generic/DefaultColorPhone isVirtual A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
Generic/MediaControlSkin isVirtual A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
Generic/QwertyDevice isVirtual A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
Generic/DefaultGrayPhone isVirtual A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 compatible phone from the Wireless Toolkit.
Generic/MppPhone A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 phone using the mpowerplayer for emulation. isVirtual, hasPointerEvents, hasCommandKeyEvents
Generic/SoftKeyPhone A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 phone that supports softkeys and the fullscreen mode. isVirtual, hasPointerEvents, hasCommandKeyEvents
Generic/AnyPhone A MIDP 2.0 and CLDC 1.1 phone that supports softkeys and the fullscreen mode and the JTWI standard. Use this phone to run a single application on various platforms like Nokia, Motorola, Samsung and so on. isVirtual, hasPointerEvents, hasCommandKeyEvents, isDynamic
